Text: Interesting series this one, and great quality as always - thanks tNe

This is interesting. A neurologist once told me that some people can control their seizures, either delaying the onset or stopping the full seizure when they get the 'aura'. 

Since it's really a question of the balance of excitation and inhibition in the brain, in some cases it's probably the case that people learn to generally increase inhibition in their brain by activating the frontal cortex, whose job it is to inhibit other brain areas generally. 'Willpower'?...
